A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
i was hopeful.  I was not a huge fan of the force awakens\, but i figured this would be better.  in the first scene there was a "YO MAMA" joke\, i knew it was going to be bad!  after disney erased the expanded universe\, i was curious what was in stor for luke.  well... i wish now i could forget.  

mark hamill himself was commenting on how bad luke was handled in this.  i don't care that he died\, i figured that was in the cards.  how is him being a loser\, quitter\, nephew murdering\, a-hole even possible?  this isn't the luke from the original trilogy.  

killing off snoke was terrible as well.  kylo ren is not a compelling villain.  jj has his work cut out for him.  rey has already bested ren.    beating him again is pretty dang anti-climatic.  there is so much other stuff wrong with this.  just skip this and pretend it never happened.  just pretend that the luke in the expanded universe is the luke that exists.  this movie is a pile of garbage.
